name: TruthPool
long_description: TruthPool is a permissionless, trustless oracle system designed to replace centralized legacy oracles. Participate in prediction markets, stake on outcomes, and earn rewards through our commit-reveal voting mechanism. Features include multi-tier oracle network with regular miners, partners, and sentinels, automated dispute resolution, and transparent on-chain settlements.

solana_mobile_dapp_publisher_portal.testing_instructions:
1. Connect a Solana wallet (Phantom, Solflare, etc.)
2. Navigate to Prediction Markets tab
3. Browse available markets and place predictions
4. View your Dashboard for stats and earnings
